file_content.text: Sensors have detected enemies in the port section. Destroy them.
Enemies have breached the starboard compartment. Stop their advance.
Enemy forces are interfering with the turbolaser batteries. Drive them back.
The shield generator is under attack. Defend it.
More enemy boarders have been detected. Eliminate them.
Enemy fire has burned through our shields. Assessing hull damage.
Main thrusters are hit. Even if we get the power back online, the situation may not be salvageable.
Detecting multiple hostile forces approaching the bridge. Setting up barricades.
I did not ask for your assessment. Speak only if you have an update or you will lose your tongue.
Hold your ground. Or die trying.
We will not lose this position. I swear on my life.
Repair units, report to the subsidiary reactor!
Port side thruster is taking damage! All able engineers head to the lower decks. Prepare for hostile resistance!
All remaining personal fall back to the bridge. Enemy forces incoming. Do not let them through!
